Damn.  I had started putting the date and purchase price in my books in the
last few years.  Unfortunately, it wasn't in this book.  I do remember
buying it in early 2002 from Satcho.  Maybe check with them?

 

I checked there website and Michael doesn't have a copy currently available.
He would, however, know what they sell for.

 

http://www.satcho.com/

 

Jim
